application.description: General settings for the whole application

files.description: Each text needs to be put into a folder with the name of the lesson. See example lesson with example texts as template.
files.title: Lesson files

lang.description: Choose the language of the interface. To change the language of the reading voice go to the voice settings.
lang.title: Language settings

application.title: Application

chapter.description: Manually select which chapter to launch
chapter.title: Chapter selection

style.errorwarning: Flash screen red when user mistyped letter
style.title: Style

voice.description: All settings related to the reading voice

amplitude.description: How loud the voice will be
amplitude.title: Amplitude

capitals.description:
Emit click sound if word starts with capital 1: Use a click sound to indicate when a word starts with a capital letter, or double click if word is all capitals.
2: Speak the word "capital" before a word which begins with a capital letter.
Other values: Increases the pitch for words which begin with a capital letter. The greater the value, the greater the increase in pitch. (eg.: 20)
capitals.title: Capitals

pitch.description: Additional gap between words in 10 ms units
pitch.title: Pitch

volume.description: Volume relative to the global volume
volume.title: Volume

voice.title: Voice

result.title: Result
result.win: Congratulation you mastered this lesson! Check your results and proceed to the next level.
